attributes.action: RE COVID 19..ANY POTENTIAL VACCINE MUST BE OPTIONAL IT MUST NOT BE COMPULSORY
attributes.additional_details: let the people decide for themselves whether they should or shouldn't be vaccinated
attributes.background: any potential vaccine must be optional UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES MUST IT BE COMPULSORY

rejection.details:
It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.

You might like to sign this related petition:

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442
